@dorkyanil Not yet. I'll be able to apply for Indefinite leave to remain this September and then citizenship 1 year later. ðŸ˜Š
@dorkyanil and it's annoying that they're getting away with this stupid rule simply because no one has probably challenged them in court.
@dorkyanil exactly. It would be better if they assessed every case individually but they won't even let me submit my visa application. ðŸ˜©
@dorkyanil I can only renew it 28 days before it expires.
@dorkyanil I just can't believe every single embassy in the eu zone has this rule that directly breaches an EU Directive.
@dorkyanil that is if we travel together which we plan to. But these schengen visa rules directly breach his right to free movement.
@dorkyanil Aaron is supposed to have the right to free movement in the eu as a British citizen. Under EU Directive 2004/38 I have same right
@dorkyanil I can't get a schengen visa bc my uk visa expires in May. There's no way around it and no exceptions are made.
Oh, how wonderful it feels to be a second class citizen when you've followed every single immigration rule religiously for 10 years.
Just because my UK visa expires soon doesn't mean I want to sneak into Schengen zone and stay there illegally. Like, duh, I have pets in UK.
Applying for a Schengen visa has been of the most frustrating experiences of my life in the UK so far. #bureaucracyinitsfinest

Company to avoid: @laptopsdirectuk.Paid for Next Day Delivery, order arrived 7 working days later than promised.No response to emails either
@laptopsdirectuk requested to cancel order on 26/12/2017 because I didn't need it anymore - needed before Xmas. No response from you so far.
@laptopsdirectuk checked the invoice and my order as only shipped YESTERDAY (04/01/17) when it should've been shipped on 21/12/2016.
@laptopsdirectuk ordered from you on 21/12/16 for next day delivery on 22/12/16. Order finally arrived today (7 working days later).
